item.title: Recap: Social Innovation Summit 2018
item.description: Sustainability has always been an important topic in my life. But if I’m being honest, I don’t really know much about it. I know the general concept, but not much beyond that. That is why I was so stoked about this conference. I learned that sustainability is part of something much bigger: social innovation. One of the sessions that I attended was a refugee crisis-related technology. Ben Mason of betterplace-lab.
